comment: BG Hot, Sweet, hardworking, & girl with all the tea on the campus. Most self-sufficient woman I have ever met, Love all the time we spent together talkin all night, Really love the bond of love, care & mutual understanding we share. All the best for future & let's continue our crazy moments in BLR.
name: Aayushi Choubey

comment: BG hot, tumhare liye to kitna bhi likhun kam hai yr. Bas tere bina college life me vo 'maze aayenge' wala part missing hota. From meeting at staircase to becoming bestiies- vo gossips, life advices, dances, green ulti, ur confidence, tailorgiri in ur every dress😂. U are so amazing, love you cutie🥰

comment: Haye meri haseen dillruba BG!'kamino ka adda'se'505 rocks' tk ka safar,confession page,room k darwaze p khade hoke ghnto tk gossip/rants,outfit discussions,chefgiri,events p naachna,Dil khol k hasna(&tbc😜).Sure knows how to make trips memorable(iykyk).Roomies 4 lyf(iiti->blr)!luv u Lil genius❤️

comment:
If Bhavya's kids are reading this, then let me tell you your mum was a cute funny and mischievous lil' baby back in the day.
Kabhi kisi baat ko leke dante to puchna "what if I ask the same to your friends about you?" I can bet it would be hilarious. 
Hello kids I'm your friend too........
name: Sahil Singh Shekhawat

comment: Those Gossips, Instagram profiles(iykyk), stalkers association, countless chats, some "good" google forms, and Kshipra terrace, were always the best memories shared with you. Hope we continue our gossip sessions later also :-)

comment: Drama Queen, hardworking, competitive and always happy. Knows how to find happiness in small things. One of the first friend in college 👉👈 to My Bangalore bro 🤜🤛 gossip partner in BTP lab 🙃. Keep smiling , be confident as always and keep growing. It's been great to be with you in these 4 years♥
name: Garvit Gupta

comment: You're a cool, sweet and lively girl. I'll never forget the New Year'24 night😂. Those outings in Bangalore were a blast (voh reel practice😂), will cherish them always!  Best wishes for the future ! Stay in touch❤️
name: Kanchi Pardhi

comment: The first guys to meet me in quarantine, will never forget the conversation we had while being a floor apart. The one who laughs at my lame jokes like my sister. I'll really miss those campus walks, haunted talks, and of course, the pod sessions. Good luck for the future, and ya, let's meet soon.
name: Varun Kumar

comment: Sweet, intelligent and understanding girl. Thank you for all hair lessons. Mussoorie and goa trips par boht maje aaye and u r the reason for hating green color😂 Keep smiling, Be healthy and blr m bhi maje krenge and aage bhi trips par jayenge sath m🙂

comment: BG, the most hardworkiing & chulbuli girl of our grp. Online m gossips & gyan kliye thanks. Tere bachkaane joke and ideas are always fun to listen (but implementation m fatt jati h 😶).  Ab isse jyada kya kahu, mai nashe m talli hogya (iykyk 🙂) , khair take care and stay this chulbuli. Best wishes.
name: Himanshu Gupta

comment: From Dukhi aatma 🥹🥹 to Girl Boss😈😈. A perfect word for you is "Dominatrix". A perfect combination of 🥺🥺 and 😡😡. Never going to forget our escapades during online semesters🥶🥶. Keep growing and never stop being mischievous😈😈.
name: Ayush

comment: The stalker who shared a lot of gossips😂. Fsz me tp se le kr Banglore ki masti me boht maze aaye. The competitive girl who aced everything 🔥. Campus walks aur pod me ghumna was a lot of fun. Bndi nhi banwayi tune abhi tk😂. Stay happy and be in touch !

comment: You're an absolute blast to hang out with! 🎉 Our time in Goa was unforgettable, filled with so much laughter and fun. 🏖️ You are a true DJ enjoyer 🍻We couldn't get enough of your electrifying energy! 🎶 Let's keep the good times rolling! 🌟Ha, next trip me scooty par double seat hogi (IYKYK)

comment: Sweet and Sexyyyy, you have a very charming personality....love the way you dress up and carry yourself, I'm gonna miss you and our flat bkc we did, keep shining✨, milte hain, Wishing you lots of happiness! 😊

comment: Dear Bhavya, a talented and  hardworking person yet very humble. Thank you for always being kind and sweet to me. It was always enjoyable talking to you & sharing laughs. All the best for your future, wishing you a happy journey ahead.

comment: You're absolutely fantastic! Receiving those tips was genuinely delightful. Wishing you the very best as you continue to shine and flourish in all aspects of life!
